sentences.en: a belated attempt to increase support
sentences.cn: 一个迟来的增加资助的举措

sentences.en: Both a premature and a belated retreat , of course, bring losses.
sentences.cn: 退却过早和过迟, 当然都有损失.

sentences.en: Do you still get a year older? Happy Belated Birthday!
sentences.cn: 那么你还会因此而增长一岁 吗 ?送给你我迟到的祝福.

sentences.en: Good morning and Merry ( belated ) Christmas to you all!
sentences.cn: 早上好,祝大家圣诞快乐! ( 晚了点哦 )

sentences.en: I know it's a little belated, but we got you the perfect wedding present!
sentences.cn: 我知道这有点迟, 但是我们给你准备了最棒的结婚礼物!

sentences.en: It is really a belated gift.
sentences.cn: 这真是一份迟来的礼物!

sentences.en: Several young merrymakers were chattering at the bar before making a belated visit to the theatre.
sentences.cn: 几个寻欢作乐的年青人,在酒吧边说个没完,去戏院为时已晚却还不想走.

sentences.en: The award is being made in belated recognition of her services to the industry.
sentences.cn: 这一獎项是对她为本行业所作贡献的迟来的表彰.

sentences.en: The belated travellers lost their way in the forest.
sentences.cn: 天色已晚尚在赶路的旅行者们在森林中迷了路.

sentences.en: The gentleman who uttered the cries was evidently a belated Mormon.
sentences.cn: 四点差几分,他们已经又回到了车站,他走进车厢,坐到原来的座位上.

sentences.en: They made a belated attempt to save her life.
sentences.cn: 他们力图挽救她的生命,可是已经太迟了.

sentences.en: We shall be belated as to the haymaking up our way.
sentences.cn: 要不然我们就赶不上晒干草的季节了.

sentences.en: Will the WTC a belated icon? To what?
sentences.cn: 世贸中心会变成迟到的像征 吗 ?是什么的像征?

sentences.en: With a belated insight he understood suddenly.
sentences.cn: 他直到此时才觉得心里豁然一亮.

sentences.en: You are always firing belated shots.

trans.tran_cn: 来得很迟的，来得很晚的，过时的，陈旧的
